title: BRIEF-Le Château Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
BRIEF-Le Château Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.01

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 17:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Le Château Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.01 Sept 20 (Reuters) - Le Chateau Inc : * LE CHTEAU REPORTS SECOND QUARTER RESULTS * LE CHATEAU INC - QTRLY COMPARABLE STORE SALES, WHICH INCLUDE ONLINE SALES, DECREASED 2.5% * LE CHATEAU INC QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * LE CHATEAU INC - SALES FOR Q2 ENDED JULY 27, 2019 AMOUNTED TO $49.7 MILLION AS COMPARED WITH $53.3 MILLION FOR Q2 ENDED JULY 28, 2018 * LE CHATEAU INC - SALES CONTINUE TO BE NEGATIVELY IMPACTED BY REDUCED MALL AND STORE TRAFFIC

BRIEF-Le Château Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.01
